ygData.subject: What game features would you like to see added?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, we know they are adding vases, coffins, and chests that can be opened or smashed into the game with Lost Dungeons of Norrath, but are there any other
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, we know they are adding vases, coffins, and chests that can be opened or
smashed into the game with Lost Dungeons of Norrath, but are there any other
features you would like to see added to Everquest?
Or, if you could go back in time and change something about Everquest during
it's creation to have certain features, what would you have done
differently?
Feel free to go into detail if you want. :-)
(I'm extremely bored bc I injured my wrists and can't play EQ much for
awhile)
luv,
-Su
Baron Conwyn Collyrium lvl 56 epic cleric, officer of The Spellbinders
The Tribunal server
